nodes.text: Embarkation Station 7 was a hangar bay on the Arkadianate capital of Calimondretta. It was part of a cluster of domes on the surface of the planet Syned that was connected to Patriot Hall and the rest of the city by a series of southern underground corridors. In 1032 BBY, Station 7 was used to hold a silver shuttle used to courier the captive Sith Lord Quillan to his grandmother Vilia Calimondra, family matriarch of the Calimondra family. The Bothan spy Narsk Ka'hane was tasked by the Sith Lord Arkadia Calimondra with couriering the youth to Vilia's home.

During the fighting created by Jedi Knight Kerra Holt and Brigadier Jarrow Rusher's successful escape, Narsk foiled a conspiracy by Arkadia to kill her younger brother by fitting his hoverchair with nerve gas. Narsk swapped the real one for a double and managed to escape with Quillan into hyperspace. The station was damaged during a series of explosions triggered during the fighting.
